dao.db

Class CustomerDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDaoDb
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
    This layer contains CRUD methods & additional methods for using in the facade layer, according to user needs (no business logic).
